title: Simple Symbols
problem_statement:
Simple Symbols

Problem Description

Have the function SimpleSymbols(str) take the str parameter being passed and determine if it is an acceptable sequence by either returning true or false.

The str parameter will be composed of + and = symbols with several characters between them (i.e. ++d+=+++c++=a)).

For the string to be true, each letter must be surrounded by a + symbol.

The string will not be empty and will have at least one letter.

Examples

Example 1:

Input: "+d+=3=+5+"
Output: true

Explanation: The letter 'd' is surrounded by '+' symbols. The digits '3' and '5' do not need to be surrounded by '+'.

Example 2:

Input: "+f++d+"
Output: false

Constraints

  • The string will not be empty.
  • The string will have at least one letter.
  • The string will be composed of +, =, and other characters (implied to include letters and digits).
